css: .container picture img {            border-width: 7px;            border-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);            border-style: solid;            filter: drop-shadow(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 0px 2px 4px);        }        .container{            display: grid;            grid-template-columns: repeat(4,1fr);            grid-template-rows: 240px;            font-size: 1.25rem;        }        .img1{            grid-column: 2/4;            grid-row: 1/3;        }        .img2 {            grid-column: 3/5;            grid-row: 2/4;         }        .intro{visibility: hidden;opacity: 0;transition: opacity 1s ease-in-out;grid-column: 2/3;            grid-row: 3/4;            color:white;        }        .intro::first-letter {            color: #903;            float: left;            font-family: 'Parisienne', cursive;            font-size: 75px;            line-height: 60px;            padding-top: 4px;            padding-right: 8px;            padding-left: 3px;            }        .hero img {            display: block;            transform: scaleX(1) scaleY(1);            border-width: 0px;            border-radius: 0px;            filter: drop-shadow(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 0px 2px 13px);        }        .hero {            display: flex;            justify-content: center;            margin-bottom: 16px;        }.show {visibility: visible;opacity: 1;}
